review_body: Hapcheon Image Theme Park is an open set site where you can see the images of the different periods as well as beautiful nature along with it~It has filmed many works such as Drama: Gaksital, Light and Shade, East of Eden, Kyungsung ScandalMovie: Sunny, Brotherhood as well~ Ticket is about 3000 won per personOpen Hour is from 09:00~18:00 Take a nice break out from the city, and enjoy spending your time here with your friends and family. Also pets are allowed at this place.
